name: Day Limmit
short_description: Day Limmit is a project started to satisfy the terms of my end-of-the-year exam for my programming class. But, because I'm a boasting over-achiever in that class I decided to make a full-out Text RPG... with Artwork... And Sound... Annnyways, It's not just for school, if it was just for school, It'd be some simple number guessing game or something... Sooo, because I have to do it for school, I'm making the most of it, and enjoying it, it won't just be for school.
summary: A text RPG programmed in VB.
